about_the_game:
Works on 64bit Windows, Linux(SteamOS) and MacOS(both ARM & Intel)!


Game analysis:
Space Yugoslav is an old school 2D shooter where you play as a bounty hunter named Nada. Survive another night at your very risky job and get back home with your space Stoyadin in one piece.

Mission statement:
Your mission is to save non-alignment space colonies from space police raids. Escape bullets, shoot the police out of the colonies, earn some extra money, drive your Stoyadin through space and get back to your love at home, as soon as possible.

Controls:
Gamepad/joystick, keyboard, with extra mouse option for shooting

FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT!

TESTED BY HUNDREDS OF PLAYERS ON REBOOT WEEKEND 2022 GAMING FAIR:

November 12th and 13th, 2022 - Zagrebački Velesajam, Zagreb, Croatia, EU

  • Thank you everyone for coming to the Reboot Weekend gaming fair!
  • Space Yugoslav 2D was played by hundreds of players, we also gave prizes to those who were the first to complete it!
  • We received very positive and high-quality feedback!
  • It is priceless to see so many smiling faces of all ages, while having fun playing what you have been creating for months.
  • Special thanks to the entire Reboot powered by A1 organization of the festival for enabling us to present our game live, to Pismo entrepreneurial incubator for lending laptops, Lea Ćurić for plush stoyadins and of course to all colleagues for these wonderful two days.


Credits:
Programming and story: Sonja Hranjec
Graphics: Ivana Vidović & Sonja Hranjec
Music: Faraon Slavko
Mentor: Dominik Cvetkovski

(c)2022. - 2024. - Affordable Care Games

legal_notice: This is a work of fiction. All the names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents in this game are either the product of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mint/Ubuntu 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mint/Ubuntu 64bit
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Graphics: RTX
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: works both on Metal and Intel Macs

name: Space Yugoslav 2D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Fun and funny game that gets the retro feel right, even one-shot kill is on point, but developers give you a lot of lives and continue checkpoints! This is great!”
Space Game Junkie
short_description: Horizontal old school 2D shooter where you play as a bounty hunter named Nada. Survive another night at your very risky job, save the space non-alignment colonies from police raid and get back home at one piece alive! 7 levels, loads of new-retro-feel SHMUP fun!
